air.title: Air quality
air.tooltip: Foreign smells (from fields, factories, etc.). How nice to breathe.

water.title: Water quality
water.tooltip: Water problems (smell, taste, color, itching). How good it is.

logistic.title: Basic and social infrastructure
logistic.tooltip: The number and quality of shops, cafes, entertainment facilities, hairdressers, gyms, etc. nearby.

transport.title: Transport and location conditions
transport.tooltip: How easy it is to get to the needed places by public or personal transport, bicycle, on foot.

noize.title: Light and noise pollution
noize.tooltip: How much noise and light disturbs. 1 - disturbs strongly, 5 - does not disturb.

clean.title: Cleanliness and tidiness
clean.tooltip: The amount of garbage. Caring for the appearance of the entrances/lawns/areas.

chill.title: Outdoor activities and walks
chill.tooltip: The presence of parks, water, walks and bike paths nearby, as well as their equipment.

safety.title: Safety
safety.tooltip: How safe does it feel to live in this area compared to other places.

pets.title: Life with pets
pets.tooltip: How well tenants treat pets. Walking and training areas.

kids.title: Life with kids
kids.tooltip: Infrastructure for children: kindergartens and playgrounds, schools nearby - and security.

parking.title: Parking places
parking.tooltip: Parking space problems. 1 - no places, 5 - no problem.
